PAID Shinsengumihq LJ Acct
http://shinsengumihq.livejournal.com/

Goal of the LJ acct:
1)to link to LJ Shinse=
ngumi related members so they show up on the 
friends page (with their perm=
ission)
2)to alert the LJ Shinsengumi community to updates at the main 
htt=
p://www.shinsengumihq.com site

ngumi in pop-culture 
(this includes, original fanwork of all kinds, univer=
se based 
fanfic/2D/3Dart/media, and commercial pop-culture aka "profession=
al" 
releases as well as RPG alerts)
4)Basically this blog is the "to-do li=
st" of the pop culture updates 
which will eventually show up on the main w=
ebsite here:
http://www.shinsengumihq.com/pop.htm

tual friends" which means you email those 
community leaders and request mu=
tual friending---if they are not 
interested then don't add them to your fr=
iends list (this is all

Opening Position(s) for maintainer
1)y=
ou either have a good grasp of the Livejournal interface or you 
are willin=
g to learn very quickly
2)you are willing to devote a reasonable amount of =
time in the 
initial stages to develop a sleek look for the blog
3)you are =
organized and your posts are so easy to understand the 
inept webmaster of =
the website can glance at the blog and just know 
exactly how to update the=
 webpage
4)you will notify the owner of the blog or volunteers at 
shinseng=
umihq.com when you will be no longer able to fulfill your

ou need a substitute

g=85after 3 weeks 
of service, you will be gifted with 1 year paid membersh=
ip on LJ for 
whatever personal blog you have or paid membership to Deviant=
art

account =
should there be an emergency of some sort

The Blog is ***not=85..
1)a pers=
onal rant space for the volunteer maintainer to discuss his 
or her persona=
l life
2)a place to answer detailed shinsengumi questions unless those 
que=
stions may be answered somewhat accurately (for example a simple 
question =
"what year was Saitou Hajime born?" vs a hard 
question "give me the entire=
 Hijikata Toshizofamily tree")---
questions should generally be directed to=
 the mailing list 
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/SHQ/ where several dozen p=
eople may be 
able to help
if someone asks "where is the best LJ PMK commun=
ity" then the 
maintainer may direct him or her to that community thus at t=
imes you 
are also an "info desk" person
3)a place to post negative comment=
ary on other websites or review 
fanwork (for example  do not say "that fan=
fic is too OOC for me") 
your job is simply to highlight fanwork, not appra=
ise it
